verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> 'When you come into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>you,<s%> then the land shall <S%H7673>keep<s%> a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2168>prune<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> in its <S%H8393>fruits;<s%>

but in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> there shall be a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> for the <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> You shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field<s%> or <S%H2168>prune<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

What grows of <S%H5599>itself<s%> in your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> you shall not <S%H7114>reap,<s%> and the <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of your <S%H5139>undressed<s%> vine you shall not <S%H1219>gather.<s%> It shall be a <S%H8141>year<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> for the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be for <S%H402>food<s%> for <S%H5650>you;<s%> for yourself, for your servant, for your <S%H519>maid,<s%> for your hired <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and for your <S%H8453>stranger,<s%> who lives as a foreigner with <S%H8453>you.<s%>
For your <S%H929>livestock<s%> <S%H2416>also,<s%> and for the animals that are in your <S%H776>land,<s%> shall all its <S%H8393>increase<s%> be for <S%H398>food.<s%>

<S%H5608><s%>"'You shall count off <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and there shall be to you the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years,<s%> even <S%H8141>forty<s%> - nine years.

Then you shall <S%H5674>sound<s%> the <S%H8643>loud<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%> On the <S%H3117>Day<s%> of <S%H3725>Atonement<s%> you shall <S%H5674>sound<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land.<s%>

You shall make the <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H6942>holy,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> to all its <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%> It shall be a <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> to <S%H376>you;<s%> and each of you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his own <S%H272>property,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> of you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H4940>family.<s%>

That <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall be a <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> to <S%H2232>you.<s%> In it you shall not sow, neither <S%H7114>reap<s%> that which <S%H5599>grows<s%> of <S%H1219>itself,<s%> nor gather from the undressed <S%H5139>vines.<s%>
For it is a <S%H3104>jubilee;<s%> it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H398>you.<s%> You shall eat of its <S%H8393>increase<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H8141><s%>"'In this Year of <S%H3104>Jubilee<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H272>property.<s%>

<S%H4376><s%>"'If you sell <S%H4465>anything<s%> to your <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> or <S%H7069>buy<s%> from <S%H3027>your<s%> <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> you shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another.<s%>

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>Jubilee<s%> you shall <S%H7069>buy<s%> from your <S%H5997>neighbor.<s%> According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>crops<s%> he shall sell to <S%H4376>you.<s%>

<S%H6310>According<s%> to the <S%H7230>length<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> its <S%H4736>price,<s%> and <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H4591>shortness<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H4591>diminish<s%> its <S%H4736>price;<s%> for he is <S%H4376>selling<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the crops to <S%H8393>you.<s%>
You shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another;<s%> but you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H6213><s%>"'Therefore you shall do my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3427>them;<s%> and you shall dwell in the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
The <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H7648>fill,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
If you <S%H559>said,<s%> "What shall we <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year?<s%> <S%H2232>Behold,<s%> we shall not sow, nor <S%H622>gather<s%> in our <S%H8393>increase;<s%>"

then I will <S%H6680>command<s%> my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and it shall bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> for the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

You shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits,<s%> the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8671>store;<s%> until the ninth <S%H8141>year,<s%> until its <S%H8393>fruits<s%> come <S%H935>in,<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the old <S%H3465>store.<s%>
<S%H776><s%>"'The land shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> in <S%H6783>perpetuity,<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1616>mine;<s%> for you are strangers and live as foreigners with <S%H8453>me.<s%>
In all the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> you shall <S%H5414>grant<s%> a <S%H1353>redemption<s%> for the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H251><s%>"'If your brother becomes <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and <S%H4376>sells<s%> some of his <S%H272>possessions,<s%> then his <S%H7138>kinsman<s%> who is next to him shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H1350>redeem<s%> that which his <S%H251>brother<s%> has <S%H4465>sold.<s%>
If a <S%H376>man<s%> has no one to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>it,<s%> and he becomes <S%H1767>prosperous<s%> and finds sufficient means to redeem <S%H4672>it;<s%>

then let him <S%H2803>reckon<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> since its <S%H4465>sale,<s%> and <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5736>surplus<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> to whom he <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H7725>it;<s%> and he shall return to his <S%H272>property.<s%>

But if <S%H3027>he<s%> <S%H1767>isn't<s%> able to <S%H4672>get<s%> it back for <S%H4465>himself,<s%> then what he has sold shall remain in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him who has <S%H7069>bought<s%> it until the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee:<s%> and in the <S%H3104>Jubilee<s%> it shall be <S%H3318>released,<s%> and he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H272>property.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H4376>sells<s%> a <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in a <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> then he may <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it within a <S%H8552>whole<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after it has been <S%H4465>sold.<s%> For a full <S%H3117>year<s%> he shall have the right of <S%H1353>redemption.<s%>

If it <S%H1350>isn't<s%> redeemed within the <S%H4390>space<s%> of a <S%H8549>full<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is in the <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H6965>made<s%> sure in <S%H6783>perpetuity<s%> to him who <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H1755>it,<s%> throughout his generations. It shall not be <S%H3318>released<s%> in the <S%H3104>Jubilee.<s%>

But the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages<s%> which have no <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> them shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> with the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H776>country:<s%> they may be <S%H1353>redeemed,<s%> and they shall be <S%H3318>released<s%> in the <S%H3104>Jubilee.<s%>

<S%H5892><s%>"'Nevertheless the cities of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> may <S%H1353>redeem<s%> at any <S%H5769>time.<s%>

The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> that was <S%H4465>sold,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> and it shall be <S%H3318>released<s%> in the <S%H3104>Jubilee;<s%> for the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
But the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of their <S%H5892>cities<s%> may not be <S%H4376>sold;<s%> for it is their <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>

<S%H251><s%>"'If your brother has become <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and his hand <S%H4131>can't<s%> support him among <S%H3027>you;<s%> then you shall <S%H2388>uphold<s%> <S%H2416>him.<s%> He shall live with you like an <S%H1616>alien<s%> and a temporary <S%H8453>resident.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> no <S%H5392>interest<s%> from him or <S%H8636>profit,<s%> but <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> that your <S%H251>brother<s%> may live among <S%H2416>you.<s%>
You shall not <S%H5414>lend<s%> him your <S%H3701>money<s%> at <S%H5392>interest,<s%> nor <S%H5414>give<s%> him your <S%H400>food<s%> for <S%H4768>profit.<s%>

I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and to be your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H251><s%>"'If your brother has grown <S%H4134>poor<s%> among <S%H4376>you,<s%> and sells himself to <S%H5647>you;<s%> you shall not make him to <S%H5656>serve<s%> as a <S%H5650>slave.<s%>
As a hired <S%H7916>servant,<s%> and as a temporary <S%H8453>resident,<s%> he shall be with <S%H5647>you;<s%> he shall serve with you until the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee:<s%>

then he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H1121>you,<s%> he and his children with <S%H7725>him,<s%> and shall return to his own <S%H4940>family,<s%> and <S%H7725>to<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
For they are my <S%H5650>servants,<s%> whom I brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> They shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H4466>as<s%> <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>
You shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%> over him with <S%H6531>harshness,<s%> but shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H5650><s%>"'As for your male and your <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H1471>slaves,<s%> whom you may have; of the nations that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7069>you,<s%> from them you may buy <S%H5650>male<s%> and female <S%H519>slaves.<s%>

Moreover of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8453>aliens<s%> who <S%H1481>live<s%> among <S%H7069>you,<s%> of them you may buy, and of their <S%H4940>families<s%> who are with <S%H3205>you,<s%> which they have conceived in your <S%H776>land;<s%> and they will be your <S%H272>property.<s%>

You may make them an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> to hold for a <S%H272>possession;<s%> of them may you take your <S%H5647>slaves<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> but over your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> you shall not <S%H7287>rule,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> over <S%H251>another,<s%> with <S%H6531>harshness.<s%>

<S%H8453><s%>"'If an alien or temporary <S%H1616>resident<s%> with <S%H3027>you<s%> becomes <S%H5381>rich,<s%> and your <S%H251>brother<s%> beside him has grown <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and <S%H4376>sells<s%> himself to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> living among <S%H6133>you,<s%> or to a member of the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>'s <S%H4940>family;<s%>
<S%H310>after<s%> he is <S%H4376>sold<s%> he may <S%H1353>be<s%> <S%H259>redeemed.<s%> One of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> may redeem <S%H1350>him;<s%>

or his <S%H1730>uncle,<s%> or his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H7607>him,<s%> or any who is a close <S%H1320>relative<s%> to him of his <S%H4940>family<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H5381>him;<s%> or if he has grown rich, he may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>himself.<s%>

He shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> with him who <S%H7069>bought<s%> him from the <S%H8141>year<s%> that he <S%H4376>sold<s%> himself to him to the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee:<s%> and the <S%H3701>price<s%> of his <S%H4465>sale<s%> shall be according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years;<s%> according to the <S%H3117>time<s%> of a hired servant shall he be with <S%H7916>him.<s%>

If there are yet <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to them he shall give <S%H7725>back<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption<s%> out of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that he was bought <S%H4736>for.<s%>

If there <S%H7604>remain<s%> but a <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> then he shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> with <S%H6310>him;<s%> according to his <S%H8141>years<s%> of service he shall give <S%H7725>back<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption.<s%>
As a <S%H7916>servant<s%> hired <S%H8141>year<s%> by year shall he be with <S%H7287>him:<s%> he shall not rule with <S%H6531>harshness<s%> over him in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
If he <S%H1350>isn't<s%> redeemed by these <S%H3318>means,<s%> then he shall be released in the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee,<s%> <S%H1121>he,<s%> and his children with him.

For to me the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H5650>servants;<s%> they are my <S%H5650>servants<s%> whom I brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
